channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Foreign disinformation enters its AI era — just as U.S. pulls back resources to fight it
item.description: The world of AI -generated, adversarial disinformation is growing rapidly — and it's already indistinguishable from run-of-the-mill social posts. Why ...

item.title: AI bots will soon overrun humans on the internet
item.description: Bots will overrun humans on the internet in generative AI's next massive disruption. Why it matters: The internet connected humanity — but an AI-drive...

item.title: Newsom signs California redistricting measures in response to Texas bill
item.description: California Gov. Gavin Newsom signed two redistricting bills into law on Thursday after the state's Democratic-controlled Legislature passed them earli...

item.title: Hurricane Erin brings "life-threatening" surf and rip conditions to U.S. East Coast
item.description: Hurricane Erin began moving away from the Mid-Atlantic Coast after its outer bands pummeled the North Carolina Outer Banks, but forecasters warned thr...

item.title: Florida ordered to undo Alligator Alcatraz due to environmental risks
item.description: A federal judge in a ruling Thursday night prohibited state and federal officials from bringing new detainees to Alligator Alcatraz , the hastily buil...

item.title: Trump thanks officers and National Guard troops in D.C. stop
item.description: President Donald Trump visited law enforcement officers in D.C. as the administration continued its efforts to exert control over the city.

item.title: Supreme Court clears way for nearly $800 million in cuts to NIH grants
item.description: The Trump administration said the research was unscientific and went against efforts to end initiatives related to diversity, equity and inclusion.

item.title: Newsom signs bills for redrawing voting maps as parties fight for control
item.description: California races toward redrawing congressional maps as Texas moves toward final approval of its plans.

item.title: What’s at stake as Trump’s redistricting push sparks a national map fight
item.description: New congressional maps could determine which party wins control of the House in next year’s elections — but election experts say they could also shape...

item.title: These states could redistrict before the 2026 midterms
item.description: As Trump pushes for a more Republican-friendly House map, more than half a dozen states are potential targets for mid-decade tweaks to congressional b...

item.title: Former Trump statistics chief slams Friday firing of Erika McEntarfer
item.description: Bill Beach said the president's suggestions that the jobs report was rigged betrayed a misunderstanding in how those numbers are assembled.

item.title: Trump fires statistics chief after soft jobs report
item.description: The monthly jobs report showed just 73,000 jobs in July, with big reductions to May's and June's numbers

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
